question: Condensation in the water cycle can best be described as the result of water vapor
candidate_answers: (A) rising into the atmosphere, cooling and changing into a liquid form. (B) rising into the atmosphere, warming and changing into a gaseous form. (C) changing from a liquid form into a solid and forming snow. (D) changing from a gas form into a solid and forming hail.
answer: rising into the atmosphere, warming and changing into a gaseous form.
label: B
